== Getting the Source Code ==

<code>svn checkout http://hopmod.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/ hopmod </code>

== Dependencies ==

* Linux or FreeBSD
* GeoIp C library ([http://www.maxmind.com/app/c Download])
* SQLite3 C library ([http://www.sqlite.org/download.html Download])
* Boost C++ Libraries ([http://sourceforge.net/project/showfiles.php?group_id=7586&package_id=8041&release_id=619445 Download]) (only headers)
** mpl
** type_traits
** function
** bind
** shared_ptr
* libmicrohttpd ([ftp://ftp.gnu.org/gnu/libmicrohttpd/libmicrohttpd-0.3.1.tar.gz Download])

=== Perl Modules used by the IRC Bot ===

==Base Bot==
* LWP::UserAgent
* HTTP::Request
* Config::Auto
* POE::Component::IRC::State
* POE::Component::IRC::Plugin::Connector
* POE::Component::IRC::Plugin::AutoJoin
* POE::Component::IRC::Plugin::FollowTail

==Player Locator Module==
* IO::Socket
* threads
* threads::shared
* LWP::Simple

=== PHP Scoreboard ===

* PHP 5
* PHP PDO Sqlite Module

=== Patches ===

* bin/patcher.php requires PHP 5.

== Compiling the Server ==

Enter the src directory and run the make program, that's it, no configure script is provided unfortunately. Output files are written to the <tt>"../bin"</tt> directory.

<code><pre>
cd src
make
</pre></code>

== Starting the Server ==

<code>bin/serverctl start</code>

== Stopping the Server ==

<code>bin/serverctl stop</code>
